name: Be the VIRUS
description:
This game is about a deadly virus who needs your help to live. You are helping through a program what detects the quality of the person immune system and the color of their skin, but this program is a littlebit buggy and you only can see one type of person black or white.

In the game there are normal adaults with normal speed (represented as squares), young childrens who are fast with a bad immune system (represented as circles)   and adaults with a good immune system (represented as mines).
